summary: Completed RBAC wrong-hotel dispute testing. All 11 tests passed (100% success rate). Verified that hotel1 admin cannot dispute hotel2's settlements (403 FORBIDDEN), and hotel2 admin can dispute their own settlements (200 OK). Also fixed password hashing bug in dev_seed_users.py.

fixed_bugs.issue: Passwords were stored as plain text instead of being hashed
fixed_bugs.fix: Added hash_password() import and properly hash passwords before storing
fixed_bugs.impact: Users created via dev seed endpoint could not login

passed_tests: Super admin login with correct credentials
Seed settlements for hotel1 with hotel_id parameter (created 5)
Seed settlements for hotel2 with hotel_id parameter (created 5)
Create hotel1 admin user via dev seed endpoint
Create hotel2 admin user via dev seed endpoint
Hotel1 admin login with hashed password
Hotel2 admin login with hotel_id verification
NEGATIVE TEST: Hotel1 admin cannot dispute hotel2's settlement (403 FORBIDDEN) - RBAC working correctly
POSITIVE TEST: Hotel2 admin can dispute their own settlement (200 OK, status=disputed)
